projects.title: RFLCT
projects.description: RFLCT is a voice activated smart mirror that uses facial recognition to recognize a user and display helpful information in a beautiful inteface.

projects.title: Eliza
projects.description: Eliza is a Facebook Messenger chatbot built for Hack Against Violence, a weekend hackathon that sought ways to diffuse violence and promote social inclusion across the globe.

projects.title: Accomplishe
projects.description: ACCOMPLISHE is a web app that helps women track their moments of success, power, and growth in the workplace so that they have a clear sense of what they bring to the table and feel more confident advocating for themselves.

projects.title: A Scanner Smartly
projects.description: A Scanner Smartly is a React on Rails web and mobile app that uses Amazon and Ebay API's to automatically update Footprint's inventory and online vendor accounts whenever new products go in or out of the store.
